metadata.Title: CVE-2017-18021 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
It was discovered that QtPass before 1.2.1, when using the built-in password generator, generates possibly predictable and enumerable passwords. This only applies to the QtPass GUI.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-18021` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

qtpass - 1.2.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: qtpass package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.1-1').
